TestCase.name: testNotTranspose
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[category, max_price, w0$o0]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[category], orderBy=[max_price ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=3], strategy=[UnaryUpdateRank[0,1]], select=[*, rowNum]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category]]) +- StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[category, shopId], select=[category, shopId, MAX(price) AS max_price]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category, shopId]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

TestCase.name: testProjectRankFunc
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rk AS rank_num, rowtime, a, rk AS rank_num0, a AS a0, rk AS rank_num1]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*, rowNum]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testPruneOrderKeys
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testPrunePartitionKeys
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testPushCalcWithConditionIntoRank
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[rowtime, c], where=[>(a, 10)]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, c, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRankFunc
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testPruneUniqueKeys
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[category, max_price, rk AS w0$o0], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[category], orderBy=[max_price ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=3], strategy=[UnaryUpdateRank[0,1]], select=[*, rowNum], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[category, shopId, max_price], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[category, shopId], select=[category, shopId, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category, shopId]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testPruneUnusedProject
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[category], orderBy=[max_price ASC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=3], strategy=[UnaryUpdateRank[0,1]], select=[*, rowNum]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[category, shopId, max_price]) +- StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[category, shopId], select=[category, shopId, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[category, shopId]]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

TestCase.name: testTrivialCalcIsRemoved
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecRank(rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], select=[*, rowNum]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]])
